name: Nasmo
summary: We have some salt of our youth in us.
description: Good name in man and woman, dear my lord, Is the immediate jewel of their souls: Who steals my purse steals trash tis something, nothing; Twas mine, tis his, and has been slave to thousands; But he that filches from me my good name Robs me of that which not enriches him And makes me poor indeed.
